author: mpaulucci
content: Hi! We're building a new execution client but we want to only support post-merge forks. Unfortunately, some hive tests seems to have pre-merge configurations, for example this one: https://github.com/ethereum/hive/blob/master/simulators/devp2p/init/genesis.json . Would it make sense for to update these to use a post merge configuration?
